9) Physical Science – Multiple Choice Which of the following changes would be most likely to increase the terminal velocity of a falling object? W) Increasing the size of the object without changing its mass X) Decreasing the acceleration of gravity Y) Adding mass to the object without changing its size Z) Increasing the viscosity of the atmosphere
answer:
Y) ADDING MASS TO THE OBJECT WITHOUT
CHANGING ITS SIZE
